title: [script] Policini
content:
Hello all,  
could you please point me to a font that gets close to the sample below ?  
Many thanks,  
[as]
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content:
A font that's close is Nick Shinn's [Duffy Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016081216/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/duffy-script/demi-bold/characters.html) that we just recently talked about. Your sample may be hand-drawn, because the i's do not seem to all be identical (although they are close).

- Mike Yanega
Thank you, Mike. _Duffy Script_ has character and a nice color; I was looking for something more wiener, tho, even ‘dull.’
